meta_description: The Albany Institute of History & Art connects diverse audiences to the art, history, and culture of the Upper Hudson Valley through its collections, exhibitions, and programs.
hours_text:
# Visit

## Admission

Members:
    Free
Adults:
    $12
Seniors (62+):
    $10
Students:
    $10 (please bring ID)
Children 6–12:
    $8
Children under 6:
    Free

#### Admission Discounts

Museums For All:
    Free admission for SNAP EBT and WIC cardholders (up to 4 people per card)
Museums On Us:
    Free admission for Bank of America cardholders during the first full weekend of every month
Museum & Adventure Passes:
    Free admission for Albany Public Library card holders (must present APL-issued pass)
Healthcare worker:
    $2 off
AAA:
    $2 off
Veteran:
    $2 off
Active Military:
    Free (please show ID)

## Hours

Monday:
    Closed
Tuesday:
    Closed
Wednesday:
    10AM–5PM
Thursday:
    10AM–5PM
Friday:
    10AM–5PM*
Saturday:
    10AM–5PM
Sunday:
    Noon–5PM

## *First Fridays

Albany Institute holds extended hours for Albany's popular First Friday program! Enjoy free admission from 5–7PM on select first Fridays of each month; [visit our calendar of events to confirm dates](events/calendar).

## Library Hours

The Research Library is currently open by appointment only. Email [research@albanyinstitute.org](mailto:research@albanyinstitute.org) for more information or to schedule an appointment.

## Free Digital Guide

Enhance your visit—or explore from anywhere—with the Albany Institute's digital guide through Bloomberg Connects, the arts and cultural app created by Bloomberg Philanthropies.

### Experience the Albany Institute as only a Member can

Join or Renew today!

The Albany Institute has an exciting slate of exhibitions planned for 2026, and we invite you to join as a Member today to receive special access.

[ ](https://secure.lglforms.com/form_engine/s/OzkBmDyUrweKvYo8eNmMSQ "Join or Renew today!")

### As an Albany Institute Member, you'll enjoy:

\- Unlimited **free gallery admission**  
  
\- Priority access to new exhibitions, including opportunities to **meet visiting artists**  
  
\- Invitations to **Members-only events** and **early access to event registration**  
  
**\- Enriching education programs** at discounted costs  
  
\- 10% discount in the **Museum Gift Shop** (20% between Thanksgiving and New Year’s Day!)

[](https://narmassociation.org/ "Additional Member benefits:")

### Additional Member benefits:

Complimentary NARM Membership

At **Supporter level and above** , Albany Institute Members also receive membership in the **North American Reciprocal Museum** (**NARM**) Association, granting free access for one year to over 1,000 cultural institutions in the U.S. (including many in our region, like the Clark Art Institute, the Norman Rockwell Museum, and the Berkshire Botanical Garden).

[ ](https://narmassociation.org/ "Complimentary NARM Membership")
